name: Rogue Company: Season Three Starter Pack
name_original: Rogue Company: Season Three Starter Pack
description:
Kick off the new Rogue Company Season in style with the Season Three Starter Pack. Impress your teammates and opponents with the new Phoenix Runner Lancer outfit and Black & Gold Weapon Wrap. This pack includes 600 Rogue Bucks so you can complete your unique look in the in-game store. Save the world and look good in Season Three now!

This Pack Contains: -Phoenix Runner Lancer -Black & Gold Primary Weapon Wrap -600 Rogue Bucks
